attributes.action: bring forward legislation that prevents the same Leader of a political party from holding the office of Prime Minister for more than 2 consecutive Parliaments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
History shows that human beings are not able to properly cope with the stress of being Prime Minister for a long period of time.
The Americans, as well as a large number of other countries, recognise it is counter-productive to expect and therefore to allow Prime Ministers, or Presidents to serve more than 2 consecutive periods in office.
By limiting the continuous duration, that a single Prime Minister can serve, removes the potential for lame governments to continue beyond their natural usefulness.

Linked to this is a separate existing petition, on this website, to disallow changes in Prime Minister during the normal term of a Parliament, without a General Election.  You are recommended to join the separate existing petition to require a "within term" retiring Prime Minister to call a General Election, instead of passing the job to another member of the same political party. The current situation is not democratic

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
